com.hamweather.aeris.communication

Class PermissionsTask

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.hamweather.aeris.communication.CommunicationTask<AerisPermissions>
        • com.hamweather.aeris.communication.PermissionsTask

  • public class PermissionsTask
extends CommunicationTask<AerisPermissions>
    Task that will use the client information and query the Aeris API to see what permission the client has for accessing the API. The AerisEngine will automatically query this when AerisEngine.initWithKeys(String, String, Context) is called
    Author:
    bcollins

      static interface  PermissionsTask.PermissionsCallback
      Callback interface for handling the response for the permissions.
